oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The coming of different kinds of moths to the fire at night foretells the killing of certain types of game. The moths resemble different types of game. 1) pp.5173-5260 were translated in April 1912; except for pp.5206-5209, 2) See also The Moon, 3) This story is found in Book V-16.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Moths coming to the fire of Bushmen by night foretell the killing of certain kinds of game
